attributes.action: Review the current council tax banding legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the current system nearing 20 years, the changes to society, areas and estates it is unfair for the government to hold off on reviewing the charges levied on the residents, a number of cases for re-banding have been thrown out due to out of date policies that hit our pockets. As such isn't it time the housing minister revised this compulsive cost for a fairer system that benefits all
